item.title: 大选不确定性消除，印度银行家为首次公开募股潮做好准备
item.description: 印度已成为亚洲最热门的股票销售市场，包括首次公开募股。随着大选的结束，大量交易有望创下纪录，因为投资者正试图利用该地区第三大经济体的快速增长。【原文：India has turned into Asia’s hottest market for share sales including initial public offerings, and as elections come to a close, a bumper crop of deals is poised to set a record as investors seek to tap the rapid growth in the region’s third-largest economy.】

item.title: 拜登否决国会否决美国证券交易委员会加密货币指南的提案
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）否决了一项国会决议，该决议将否决美国证券交易委员会的指导意见，加密货币行业称该指导意见阻碍了其与银行合作的能力。【原文：President Joe Biden vetoed a congressional resolution that would strike down US Securities and Exchange Commission guidance that the crypto industry says has stymied its ability to work with banks.】

item.title: Cathie Wood 的 Ark Investment 放弃现货以太币 ETF 雄心壮志
item.description: 凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）的方舟投资管理公司（Ark Investment Management）刚刚退出了华尔街推出直接投资第二大加密货币以太币的 ETF 的竞争。【原文：Cathie Wood’s Ark Investment Management just dropped out of the Wall Street race to launch an ETF that invests directly in Ether, the second-largest cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 新政府可能放宽限制，世界农作物贸易关注印度
item.description: 新政府本月上台后，印度的贸易政策可能会发生变化，这可能会对全球粮食价格产生重大影响，农产品市场正在对此进行观察。【原文：Agricultural markets are on watch for potential shakeups in India’s trade policies after a new government assumes office this month, which could have significant ramifications on global food prices.】

item.title: 英国高管调查显示信心达到 2021 年以来最高点
item.description: 据英国董事协会称，在经济从衰退中迅速反弹后，英国企业在大选期间表现出了两年半以来最乐观的状态。【原文：UK businesses entered the general election campaign at their most optimistic in over 2 1/2 years after the economy quickly bounced back from recession, according to the Institute of Directors.】

item.title: 热爱英伟达的韩国加密货币交易商吞噬高风险人工智能代币
item.description: 随着人工智能的热潮渗入加密货币，喜欢冒险的韩国交易员们正纷纷涌入以人工智能为主题的数字资产。【原文：Risk-loving South Korean traders are piling into digital assets linked to the theme of artificial intelligence as AI hype seeps into crypto.】

item.title: 惠誉因预算盈余上调爱尔兰信用评级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）提升了爱尔兰的评级，这再次表明了爱尔兰自 14 年前接受欧盟救助以来所取得的巨大进步。【原文：Fitch Ratings upgraded Ireland, in a fresh sign of how far the country has come since it was bailed out by the European Union 14 years ago.】

item.title: 事件频发的一周，华尔街受到市场同步波动的冲击
item.description: 几个月来，熊市的声音就像破了的唱片：60/40 的投资行业仍然受到货币焦虑和财政慷慨的摆布。【原文：Bears have sounded like a broken record for months now: The 60/40 investment industry remains at the mercy of monetary angst and fiscal largesse.】

item.title: 数据显示，5 月份回购金额达 2,010 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: 根据 Birinyi Associates 公司编制的数据，受苹果公司创纪录的公告推动，美国企业在 5 月份披露了回购 2 010 亿美元自身股票的计划，创下了该月的最高纪录。【原文：Buoyed by a record announcement from Apple Inc., Corporate America disclosed plans to repurchase $201 billion of its own stock in May, the most ever for the month, according to data compiled by Birinyi Associates.】

item.title: S&P下调法国评级，马克龙受到债务谴责
item.description: S&P全球评级公司下调了法国的评级，这玷污了埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统的债务管理记录，因为他的政府在科威德疫情和能源危机之后正努力控制公共财政。【原文：S&P Global Ratings downgraded France, tarnishing President Emmanuel Macron’s record for debt management as his government struggles to get a grip on public finances in the wake of the Covid pandemic and energy crisis.】

item.title: 速汇金提高 3.98 亿美元贷款的再定价以吸引投资者
item.description: 速汇金国际公司（MoneyGram International Inc.【原文：MoneyGram International Inc. has sweetened terms of its $398 million leveraged loan repricing, as the money-transfer firm looks to complete the deal amid a record rush of activity.】

item.title: 大选临近，委内瑞拉出手支撑玻利瓦尔
item.description: 委内瑞拉政府正在加倍努力，防止玻利瓦尔在今年总统大选之前走软并导致通货膨胀率飙升。【原文：Venezuela’s government is doubling down on efforts to prevent the bolivar from weakening and causing a spike in inflation ahead of presidential elections this year.】

item.title: 美国称 "虚假 "盖蒂收购案实为 "抽水与倾销 "计划
item.description: 据美国当局称，对盖蒂图片控股公司（Getty Images Holdings Inc.【原文：A $4 billion takeover bid for Getty Images Holdings Inc. was actually a pump-and-dump scheme, according to US authorities.】

item.title: 经济放缓导致美国柴油需求创 26 年季节性新低
item.description: 受经济增长放缓的影响，3 月份美国柴油需求骤降至 26 年来最低的季节性水平。【原文：US diesel demand plummeted to its lowest seasonal level in 26 years in March, driven by slowing economic growth.】

item.title: 大都会人寿正在寻求收购欧洲直接贷款公司 Hayfin
item.description: 知情人士透露，大都会人寿保险公司（MetLife Inc.【原文：MetLife Inc. is pursuing an acquisition of Hayfin Capital Management, the private credit specialist that began exploring a sale last year, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 破纪录的一个月后，风险贷款成为信贷市场之首
item.description: 随着利率长期走高的前景增强了浮动利率债务的吸引力，投资者正将现金注入杠杆贷款，使这一高风险资产类别成为信贷市场的明星。【原文：Investors are pouring cash into leveraged loans, making the risky asset class a star performer in credit markets as the prospect of higher-for-longer interest rates boosts the appeal of floating-rate debt.】

item.title: 铜业领头羊智利公布一年多来最差月产量
item.description: 智利的铜产量创下了一年多来的最低记录，影响了这个产量最高的国家从二十年来首次年度下降中复苏。【原文：Chile registered its lowest month of copper production in more than a year, undermining the top-producing nation’s recovery from its first annual decline in two decades.】

item.title: 华尔街价值 9 万亿美元的 ETF 机器遭遇 Ticker 短缺问题
item.description:
当热门名称被占用时会发生什么？【原文：

What happens when the buzzy names are taken?

】

item.title: 国际可可组织称可可短缺情况高于此前估计
item.description: 据国际可可组织称，尽管可可价格上涨，但本季可可的短缺量仍将高于此前的预期，因为可可的消费量仍在增长。【原文：Cocoa’s shortage this season will be bigger than previously expected as consumption holds up despite higher prices, according to the International Cocoa Organization.】

item.title: 安哥拉财富基金五年来投资组合增长 12
item.description: 安哥拉主权财富基金预计，受益于其投资的非洲市场强劲的经济形势，其投资组合将在五年内扩大12%。【原文：Angola’s sovereign wealth fund expects its portfolio to expand by 12% over five years, benefiting from strong economic conditions in African markets in which it invests.】

item.title: 英国油轮司机罢工威胁部分燃料供应
item.description: 英格兰北部的油罐车司机将于本月晚些时候举行罢工，就在英国举行大选的前几周，这有可能导致英国国内燃料供应出现地区性中断。【原文：Oil tanker drivers in the north of England will strike later this month, potentially risking regional disruptions to fuel supplies within the UK just weeks before the country holds a general election.】

item.title: IXM 精炼金属部门联席主管 Sethaputra 即将离开交易员队伍
item.description: IXM 精炼金属交易部门的联席主管即将离职，这是中国矿产商中国五矿集团（CMOC Group）旗下贸易公司一系列人事变动中的最新一次。【原文：IXM’s co-head of refined-metals trading is leaving the company, the latest in a series of personnel changes at the trading house owned by Chinese miner CMOC Group.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦为下一财年设定 3.6% 的经济增长目标
item.description: 巴基斯坦在与国际货币基金组织讨论新的贷款计划时，为下一财政年度设定了 3.6% 的经济增长目标。【原文：Pakistan set a 3.6% economic growth target for the next fiscal year as it discusses a fresh loan program with the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 奇货通讯：供应链不会自生自灭
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读《奇货》周刊，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy.】

item.title: 马克龙讨好银行，法国将降低解雇交易员的成本
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙加倍努力吸引更多的金融服务公司，法国将于下周通过一项法律，使银行解雇交易员的成本更低。【原文：France is set to pass a law next week that would make it cheaper for banks to fire traders, as President Emmanuel Macron doubles down on efforts to attract more financial services companies.】

item.title: 汽车、钢铁集团敦促加拿大配合美国对中国征收关税
item.description: 汽车制造商、钢铁生产商和工会官员敦促加拿大立法者对过度生产的中国商品加征关税，并警告加拿大有可能被美国政府视为对华软弱的合作伙伴。【原文：Auto manufacturers, steel producers and union officials urged Canadian lawmakers to hike tariffs on over-produced Chinese goods, warning Canada risks being seen as a weak partner on China by the US administration.】

item.title: 随着下一次 T+1 测试的到来，华尔街交易失败率一路走高
item.description: 周四，美国证券交易的失败率攀升，及时提醒人们本周转向更快交易系统所带来的挑战依然存在。【原文：The failure rate for US securities transactions climbed on Thursday, in a timely reminder of the lingering challenges from this week’s shift to a faster trading system.】

item.title: 土耳其 Koc 控股公司终止出售 Yapi Kredi 股份的谈判
item.description: Yapi Ve Kredi Bankasi AS 的大股东科克控股公司（Koc Holding）表示，已不再讨论出售其在这家土耳其贷款机构的股份。【原文：Koc Holding, the majority owner of in Yapi Ve Kredi Bankasi AS, said its no longer in dicussions to sell its stake in the Turkish lender.】

item.title: 降温迹象缓解美联储担忧，美元涨势减弱
item.description: 随着通胀压力的缓解加强了美联储将在年底前开始回调利率的预期，美元将迎来自 12 月以来的首次月度下跌。【原文：The US dollar is headed for its first monthly loss since December as easing inflation pressures strengthen expectations that the Federal Reserve will start dialing back interest rates before the year ends.】

item.title: 巴克莱称并购活动将继续保持两位数增长
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，"由于条件和乐观情绪都有所改善，2023 年的平静让很多交易活动被压抑"，明年的并购活动将继续保持两位数的增长。【原文：Double-digit growth in mergers and acquisitions should persist during the next year “as conditions and optimism have improved and a very quiet 2023 left much pent-up deal activity,” according to Barclays Plc.】
